page.title: 04Shopping in Kirkcaldy
page.content: In the {Templehall}area of Kirkcaldy there is a small shopping centre with a Sub-Post Office, one general store, five food stores,two take-away food shops and two betting shops.Most of the people wanted a shoe shop.However many people still prefer to go to the High Street because prices are lower and the selection is better. Meanwhile in the huge{Dunnikier Estate on the North side off the town there are only two shops.These are a Sub-Post Office and a small super- market.Most people in the estate want a chemist and a bigger supermarket. This lack of facilities makes life very hard for mothers with young families.
